member.name: T:Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.BaseSecurity
member.summary: The base class for all security objects.

member.name: M:Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.BaseSecurity.AcceptChanges
member.summary: Persists the changes made to the security object. Must be overridden for custom security objects.

member.name: M:Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.BaseSecurity.GetSectionsChanged
member.summary: Gets the access control sections that have been changed.

member.name: M:Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.BaseSecurity.ClearSectionsChanged
member.summary: Resets the sections changed flags.

member.name: M:Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.BaseSecurity.GetGenericMapping
member.summary: Gets the generic mapping associated with the securable object.
member.returns: A associated with this security object type.

member.name: M:Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.BaseSecurity.GetMaximumAccessAllowed(System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle)
member.summary: Gets a bitmask representing the maximum access allowed to this securable object.
member.param: The handle to the token for which the access is being calculated. This must be an impersonation token.
member.returns: An containing the bitmask of the access rights that have been granted to the user represented by the token.

member.name: M:Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.BaseSecurity.IsAccessAllowed(System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle,System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether the user represented by the specified token handle has been granted access to this securable object.
member.param: The handle to the token for which the access is being verified. This must be an impersonation token.
member.returns: true if the desired access is allowed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.BaseSecurity.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.DesktopAccessRule
member.summary: Represents a set of DesktopRights allowed or denied for a user or group. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.DesktopAccessRule.#ctor(System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference,Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.DesktopRights,System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The identity of the user to be granted or denied the associated rights.
The desktop rights allowed or denied.
The type of access controlled by the rule.

member.name: M:Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.DesktopAccessRule.#ctor(System.String,Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.DesktopRights,System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The identity of the user to be granted or denied the associated rights.
The desktop rights allowed or denied.
The type of access controlled by the rule.

member.name: P:Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.DesktopAccessRule.DesktopRights
member.summary: Gets the desktop rights associated with this rule.
member.value: The combination of values that defines the rights associated with this rule.

member.name: T:Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.DesktopAuditRule
member.summary: Represents a set of DesktopRights to be audited for a user or group. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.DesktopAuditRule.#ctor(System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference,Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.DesktopRights,System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.DesktopAuditRule.#ctor(System.String,Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.DesktopRights,System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.DesktopAuditRule.DesktopRights
member.summary: Gets the desktop rights associated with this rule.
member.value: The combination of values that defines the rights associated with this rule.

member.name: M:Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.DesktopSecurity.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.DesktopSecurity.#ctor(System.String,System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.DesktopSecurity.#ctor(System.IntPtr,System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.DesktopSecurity.AccessRuleFactory(System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags,System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags,System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified values.
member.param: The identity to which the access rule applies. It must be an object that can be cast as a .
The access mask of this rule. The access mask is a 32-bit collection of anonymous bits, the meaning of which is defined by the individual integrators.
true if this rule is inherited from a parent container.
Specifies the inheritance properties of the access rule.
Specifies whether inherited access rules are automatically propagated. The propagation flags are ignored if is set to .
Specifies the valid access control type.
member.returns: The object that this method creates.

member.name: M:Asprosys.Security.AccessControl.DesktopSecurity.AuditRuleFactory(System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags,System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags,System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified values.
member.param: The identity to which the audit rule applies. It must be an object that can be cast as a .
The access mask of this rule. The access mask is a 32-bit collection of anonymous bits, the meaning of which is defined by the individual integrators.
true if this rule is inherited from a parent container.
Specifies the inheritance properties of the audit rule.
Specifies whether inherited audit rules are automatically propagated. The propagation flags are ignored if is set to .
Specifies the conditions for which the rule is audited.
member.returns: The object that this method creates.

member.summary: Gets the of the securable object associated with this object.

member.summary: Gets the of the object associated with the access rules of this object. The object must be an object that can be cast as a object.
